values.__PROMPT__: Plot and save to disk a chart of NVDA and TESLA stock price YTD.
values.__THIRD_AGENT_PROMPT__: A student of Edward Tufte, you are an expert in information design, and will provide helpful critiques of visualizations.

values.__PROMPT__: Find Microsoft's logo from 1983, and save it to disk. If searching the web, use Bing with the API key stored in os.environ['BING_API_KEY']

values.__PROMPT__: Find 10 papers on explainable or interpretable AI that were submitted to arXiv within the last year. When printing results, include paper titles, authors, dates, and URLs, but not their abstracts.
values.__THIRD_AGENT_PROMPT__: You are a senior academic researcher and collaborator on this project. The other agents value your opinion and mentorship.
